channel.title: Refer system?
channel.description:
I added the command, and it writes out who was referred by or whatever.
Alright, so here's what I want to get at. I want to make another command called ::rclaim, so they could claim 5m GP for being referred. So how do I add a line in Character Saving called referPoints? and make ::rclaim take 1 refer point off everytime they claim their GP?

item.title: Refer system?
